media.headline: Turner's two-run jack
media.blurb: LAA@LAD: Turner launches a two-run home run
media.bigblurb: Justin Turner launches a two-run homer to left-center field to put the Dodgers up 2-0 in the bottom of the 1st inning

media.headline: Espinosa's RBI groundout
media.blurb: LAA@LAD: Maybin scores on Espinosa groundout
media.bigblurb: Cameron Maybin scores on a Danny Espinosa RBI groundout to the pitcher to cut the Angels' deficit to 2-1 in the top of the 2nd inning

media.headline: Pujols' two-run smash
media.blurb: LAA@LAD: Pujols belts a two-run homer to left field
media.bigblurb: Albert Pujols smashes a two-run home run to deep left field to give the Angels a 3-2 lead in the top of the 3rd inning

media.headline: Maybin safe after challenge
media.blurb: LAA@LAD: Angels challenge, overturn caught stealing
media.bigblurb: The Angels challenge a caught stealing in the top of the 4th inning, the call is overturned and Cameron Maybin is ruled safe at third base

media.headline: Pederson's two-run homer
media.blurb: LAA@LAD: Pederson hammers two-run homer to center
media.bigblurb: Joc Pederson belts a two-run jack to center field to put the Dodgers up 4-3 in the bottom of the 6th inning

media.headline: Sanchez's game-tying RBI double
media.blurb: LAA@LAD: Sanchez ties the game with RBI double
media.bigblurb: Tony Sanchez hits an RBI double to left field to tie the game at 4 in the top of the 9th inning

media.headline: Smith gets Pennington at home
media.blurb: LAA@LAD: Smith recovers to nab Pennington at home
media.bigblurb: Will Smith makes a nice recovery and flips the ball to Michael Johnson, who tags Cliff Pennington at home in the top of the 9th inning

media.headline: Seager singles to left field
media.blurb: LAA@LAD: Seager hits an opposite-field single
media.bigblurb: Corey Seager lines an opposite-field single to left field in the bottom of the 1st inning

media.headline: Young fan overjoyed to get ball
media.blurb: LAA@LAD: Young fan ecstatic after getting a ball
media.bigblurb: A young fan holds back tears after getting a foul ball from Angels coach Alfredo Griffin
